posts.title: redis系列--linux下安装与部署
posts.text: 导语 Redis 是当前比较热门的NOSQL之一 1. redis的安装 download    https://redis.io/download scp local_file    scp -rp redis-4.0.1.tar.gz root@ip:/tmp tar file    tar -zxvf /tmp/redis-4.0.1.tar.gz -C /home/ complie && install      cd /home/redis-4.0.1/  make   cd src/  make install   2. redis的部署 文件管理    方便配置文件和cmd管理，创建bin和conf文件:在安装目录下：mkdir bin | mkdir ect                        mv src/mkreleasehdr.sh redis-check-aof redis-check-rdb redis-cli redis-sentinel redis-server redis-benchmark ./bin/                        mv redis.conf /ect 启动服务(前台)    ./bin/redis-server                 注意：默认情况下，启动的redis服务实在前台直接运行的，当关闭会话后，服务也随之关闭。 启动服务(后台)    修改conf文件      vim /ect/redis.conf    将daemonize的值改为yes.                            ./bin/redis-server ect/redis.conf     |   停止服务 bin/redis-cli shutdown (or pkill bin/redis-server) 启动客户端    ./bin/redis-cli 查看端口号    netstat -tunpl | grep 6379 3. redis 测试 启动客户端    ./bin/redis-cli              > set testkey “this is my test”              > get testkey              > “this is my test”              > exit 至此，Redis的安装部署全部成功，开始享受Redis之旅了.

posts.title: spring-cloud 漫谈
posts.text: See your changes instantly with LivePreviewDon’t guess if your hyperlink syntax is correct; LivePreview will show you exactly what your document looks like every time you press a key. Make it your ownFonts, color schemes, layouts and stylesheets are all 100% customizable so you can turn MarkdownPad into your perfect editor.

posts.title: hexo+github 成就个人blog
posts.text: MarkdownPad is a full-featured Markdown editor for Windows. Built exclusively for MarkdownEnjoy first-class Markdown support with easy access to Markdown syntax and convenient keyboard shortcuts. Give them a try: Bold (Ctrl+B) and Italic (Ctrl+I) Quotes (Ctrl+Q) Code blocks (Ctrl+K) Headings 1, 2, 3 (Ctrl+1, Ctrl+2, Ctrl+3) Lists (Ctrl+U and Ctrl+Shift+O)

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
